name: Blocks Game Free: Block Puzzle
description:
Play a completely new blocks puzzle game.
The goal of the game is to get 3 blocks in a row or column of the same color, using new blocks as they fall, and so see them explode. If the stack reaches the top before you reach the required score, it is game over. Really simple to play but hard to master.

How to play:
Use the direction buttons to move the bricks row left, right, down
Use the blue /yellow button on the left of the screen to switch the color sequence of the row.
Use the button on the right to switch the bricks row from horizontal to vertical.


You will find a lot of different blocks with various functionalities that can help you accomplish your task:
- The concrete block row: Destroys up to 3 cells in a row or column
- The electric block: Destroys up to 12 cells in diagonal
- The ice block: Smashes up to 8 cells in a cross
- The random color block: Crashes up to 8 cells and substitutes them with another random color - block.
- TNT: Makes all the blocks around him explode (max 8).
- The time bomb: Bursts all the blocks that surround her into pieces

- - - Features: - - -
• 200 free levels
• Simple rules and easy control
• Smooth and delicate animation
• Fun sound effects
• Hours of fun
• The puzzles gets harder as you progress

It is basically a special match- 3 game. have fun with it.
